remixlab.bias.event

Class ClickEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • remixlab.bias.BogusEvent
      • remixlab.bias.event.ClickEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copyable

    public class ClickEvent
extends BogusEvent
    A click event encapsulates a ClickShortcut and it's defined by the number of clicks. A click event holds the position where the event occurred ( x() and y()).

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class remixlab.bias.BogusEvent

        ALT, ALT_GRAPH, CTRL, META, NO_ID, NO_MODIFIER_MASK, SHIFT

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClickEvent(float x, float y, int b)
      Constructs a single click ClickEvent at the given position and from the given gesture-id defining the events shortcut()
      ClickEvent(float x, float y, int b, int clicks)
      Constructs a ClickEvent at the given position, from the given gesture-id defining the events shortcut(), and with the given number of clicks.
      ClickEvent(float x, float y, int modifiers, int b, int clicks)
      Constructs a ClickEvent at the given position, from the given gesture-id and modifiers which defines the events shortcut(), and with the given number of clicks.
